metadata.title: CVE-2024-52336 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A script injection vulnerability was identified in the Tuned package. The`instance_create()` D-Bus function can be called by locally logged-in userswithout authentication. This flaw allows a local non-privileged user toexecute a D-Bus call with `script_pre` or `script_post` options that permitarbitrary scripts with their absolute paths to be passed. These user orattacker-controlled executable scripts or programs could then be executedby Tuned with root privileges that could allow attackers to local privilegeescalation.

criterions.comment: tuned package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
